page.title: 11Recreation in Moy
page.content:
Recreation facilities are limited in this small community. There is no longer a Public Hall. The residents have a wide and varied collection of hobbies including fishing, gardening, wine making, music, reading, writing, photography, nature study, bird watching, camping, jogging, sketching and painting, walking and cycling, knitting, sewing, badmington, pool, snooker, darts, motor bikes and swimming. The most popular hobby is gardening.
HIGHLAND FIELD SPORTS FAIR _ a local gathering in early August _ held in a field beside Moy Hall near to the Loch. Attended by locals and visitors. STALLS FOOD TENT FISHING PONY RIDES PET SHOW SPEED BOATS POLICE DOG SHOW ARTIST ARMY HELICOPTER CLAY PIGEON SHOOTING COCONUT SHY DOG RACE PIPER
